name: Army vs. Zombies - Clash of the Underworld Dead by Uber Zany
name_original: Army vs. Zombies - Clash of the Underworld Dead by Uber Zany
description:
Can Army beat Zombies? Where’s the Air Force? Action-packed military battle against crazy zombies. It’s a fight to stay alive. Don’t let the zombies win!

Remove mad zombies by shooting them to pieces! Release pent-up frustrations with this game. Lock and load! It’s get even time!

Collect gold coins to earn new characters.


-Challenge Your Friends for Highest Score!
-Great Time-Killer Game!
-Tons of fun!

Download ‘Army vs. Zombies’ Now!!!
